item.description:
Umass Drupal User's Group (UDU) meetings will take place at ISB 241H, the first Thursday of each month, 2 - 4 PM.
Exceptions will be announced.

and check link to updated event info.

Proposed agenda:

Introductions

Drupal Successes - Review recently launched Drupal sites with a brief explanation of specific highlights of the site.

Drupal Problems - A time for asking about specific Drupal issues that people are having trouble with.

Monthly topic - A more lengthy presentation of a specific topic. Volunteers can post their suggestions? We would also like to encourage folks to post here a list of topics they wish to learn more about.

Tips and Tricks - quick 5 minute talks on helpful tips that people would like to pass along.

Although this is a UMass Drupal User Group that will hopefully encourage an opportunity for creating a Drupal community on campus, we encourage anyone in the extended Drupal community to attend. Many of us hire out projects to local Drupal developers, so we would love to meet you and get to know your area of expertise. If any of you have an interest in presenting, let us know. We understand that there is a vibrant community with the Western Mass Drupal User Group, but many of us cannot attend evening meetings in Northampton or Amherst due to the distance we travel and we felt that it was important to establish a Drupal community on campus as more and more people are developing sites using Drupal.



Read more at http://groups.drupal.org/node/176949.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Umass Drupal User's Group
